Dialogs.Dialog: Oh, so what do you like to do?
I love to go on an Adventure.
Is that so? I've /size:up//color:blue/ALWAYS/color:white//size:init/ wanted to go on an adventure.
That's great. I'm about to go on a dangerous one now. I've been wanting someone to help me. Wanna tag along?
WAIT, I DON'T HAVE TO FIGHT, RIGHT?
No, I'll be doing the fighting. You can help me by making delicious food.
